mapper.insert: INSERT INTO media_resources (product_id, media_type, media_url, file_name, file_size, mime_type, display_order, is_embedded, created_at) VALUES (#{productId}, #{mediaType}, #{mediaUrl}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{mimeType}, #{displayOrder}, #{isEmbedded}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT media_id, product_id, media_type, media_url, file_name, file_size, mime_type, display_order, is_embedded, created_at FROM media_resources WHERE product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY display_order ASC, media_id ASC
